summary: While spreading her father's ashes, Mara meets Jon who offers to give her a ride. Risking everything to escape this hell she's entered, she won't stop running until she finds safety.
cast: Michelle Page|Art Alexakis|Chris Coy|Michael Cudlitz|Lucinda Jenney|Bill Moseley
keywords: loss of voice|kidnapped woman|pregnant sister|murder of a police officer|woman urinates
title: Rogue River
